root.name: Need for Speed: V-Rally
root.description: OverviewNeed For Speed: V-Rally is the first game to be a spin-off of the traditional Need For Speed franchise where you drive rally cars similar to the Colin McRae series, but less simulation. This game was also developed in Europe under Eden Studios, not a traditional US-based EA developer. Gameplay Features: - 42 Detailed Tracks from various locales - Rally Cars such as the: Ford Escort Cosworth, Renault Megane, Peugeot 106, and Citroen Saxo - Arcade physics - Lens flare - Challenging AI
